short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block sites and manage time spent on them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TimeShield is a productivity-focused Chrome extension designed to help users block websites and manage the time they spend on them. By providing customizable lists of blocked sites and tracking daily usage, TimeShield empowers users to maintain focus and enhance their productivity throughout the day.
